title: 请求帮助。
author: 『赎罪』
txt_content: 我想用命令让玩家击杀玩家之后击杀者可以获得一个头颅。版本1.12.2。

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
/scoreboard objectives add kill playerKillCount
/give @a[score_kill_min=1] minecraft:skull 1 3
/scoreboard players set @a[score_kill_min=1] kill 0

replies.author: 百草枯
replies.txt_content:
/scoreboard objectives add kill playerKillCount
/give @a[score_kill_min=1] minecraft:skull 1 3
/scoreboard players set @a[score_kill_min=1] kill 0

replies.author: 『赎罪』
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-2-6 18:46
/scoreboard objectives add kill playerKillCount
/give @a[score_kill_min=1] minecraft:skull 1 3
/scor ...
咳咳。具体怎么用呢，第一条我知道，第二是不是用高频？
